description: Welcome to Bakerview Estates â€” a charming, quaint & family-friendly townhouse community in the heart of Aldergrove! This bright and well maintained 2-storey townhome offers 3 bedrooms + den, 2 bathrooms, and covered parking, combining comfort and convenience in one package. Front entry way flex space , galley kitchen, powder room, spacious living room with large window and access to your fully fenced private patio perfect for relaxing or space for your pets. All 3 bedrooms upstairs with the primary bedroom and 2nd bedroom boasting vaulted ceilings. Private balcony off the den, and 3rd bedroom is a fair size too! Updates including new flooring, main bathroom, and windows + roof. Ideally located close to everything including downtown Aldergrove, schools, parks, and shopping. Low strata fees!
